name: Order Up (ROYA)
description:
Play as a chef in a hectic breakfast cafe! Use WASD to move left and right to catch the food needed to complete your customer's order - be quick though, you have 20 seconds to finish the job!

This is a NextGen Skills Academy project with art & game design by Roya Taylor and programming & implementation by Kieran Rice. You can view the development process of Order Up on the following blogs:

Art and game design development blog

Programming and implementation development blog
